entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Meadow Lake

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow near noon. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 14.
